summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6170 for the improvement of Bagley Avenue from Pacific Street to North 36th Street; and certain other streets and alleys, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 86516, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
